name: Robot x Robot
overview: Robot-X-Robot is a mix between a simulation and a strategy game made by Nemesys in 1999. In the game the player have to design and build his own male or female robot using different models and parts that the game offer. Once the robot is builded the player have to assign him or her different orders that the robot will use in the combats. Before the combat the player can see a simulation of the combat to see if the orders are the best one to defeat the opponent. The combat part use a 3d graphics engine & different camera angles.
